title: UC00189_Weekend_Business_Activity_Zones
name: Identifying Weekend Business Activity Zones in Melbourne
description: Analysis of four City of Melbourne datasets—pedestrian counts, business establishments, cafés and restaurants, and industry-level business data—to identify Melbourne's busiest areas during weekends. The project highlights high-traffic hotspots and matches them with nearby businesses to support economic planning, marketing strategies, and event scheduling.
datasets: Cafés and Restaurants Dataset (City of Melbourne)
Business Establishments by Size and Industry (City of Melbourne)
